title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 477.6 - Coordination with other application procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 477.6 - Coordination with other application procedures

State Regulations

When an application for approval by the department of a
certificate of incorporation is filed in accordance with other requirements of
law, which certificate of incorporation includes among its corporate purposes
the establishment and operation of a specific facility, such application may
constitute, and be considered in lieu of, the application for an operating
certificate under section
477.3
of this Part, with such
additional or modified information as may be required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
477.6

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
